Reference

All functions

cr_symb()

A function to create symbols

dgp.spq()

Generation of qualitative process with spatial structure

FastFood

Distribution Fast-Food restaurants in Toronto

jc.test()

A function to compute jointcount test for binomial and multinomial (asymptotic and permutation distributions)

local.sp.runs.test()

A function to calculate the local spatial runs tests.

m.surround()

A function to generate m-surroundings

print(<localsrq>) plot(<localsrq>)

Methods for class localsrq

summary(<m_surr>) plot(<m_surr>) print(<m_surr>)

Method for class m_surr

methods_qmap

Method for class qmap

plot(<scantest>) summary(<scantest>)

Methods for class scan

plot(<spqtest>)

Methods for class spqtest

nb2nb_order()

A function to order the elements og the m_i-subrrounds

Newark

Ethnicity, age, marital status of residents in Newark according to 1880 US Census.

plot.sprunstest()

Plot the empirical distribution of runs

print(<summary.spjctest>)

Print method for objects of class summary.spjctest.

print(<summary.spqtest>)

Print method for objects of class summary.spqtest.

Q.map.test()

Compute the QE and QI tests of Equivalence and Independence between maps

Q.test() Q.test()

A function to compute Q test for spatial qualitative data using asymptotic distribution

q_mc()

A funcion to calculate Q using Monte Carlo

scan.test()

Compute the scan test.

similarity.test()

Compute the similarity test.

sp.runs.test()

Compute the global spatial runs test.

Spain

Spain by provinces

summary(<spjctest>)

Summary of estimated objects of class spjctest.

summary(<spqtest>)

Summary of estimated objects of class spqtest.
